website_summaries.verdict: Prices are still high on these kinds of color-changing LEDs, but this Lifx floodlight is one of the best. It's worth the splurge if you're into high-tech novelty lighting.
pros: The Lifx Color 1000 floodlight LED is an Alexa-compatible smart bulb with full color controls, robust IFTTT support, and a superb design
cons: $50 per bulb is still prohibitively expensive, especially since you'll probably need more than one of them
They also won't work with Apple HomeKit

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if there was a way to turn off the ...
customer_reviews.text: The IR is brighter than I thought, I can see the entire room from my wifi camera as if it was daylight. It does feel a bit warm to the touch while the bulb is on IR mode thought. But aside from that, it does its job. Would be nice if there was a way to turn off the IR from the app, which I hope will be fixed soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: [ attn communities: I have reposted after removing a non-url reference to an article title outside amazon which I infer is this issue since you can never be bothered to cite which text in particular is deemed problematic. Zero stars for my vexatious interactions with Amazon Community Management lowering my overall Amazon satisfaction to 4 stars. Three prior CM interactions were me-initiated. Now, CM, remove other people's reviews that are essentially "I like it. it works for me". ] I do not like this bulb. I do not like the software. I do not like lifx policy. Do not buy. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 🛡️ veracity 🛡️

customer_reviews.title: Bad bulb and Product Support Is "Backed up with Requests"
customer_reviews.text: This isn't looking good. Bulb just started flashing orange/red indicating it's a bad bulb. Bought this two months ago and it's going bad? Wrote an email to support and got no response. Sent in a second ticket a week later and got this response: "We believe any response is better than no response. We're busy working away on tickets, but we haven't gotten to yours quite yet. We apologize for the delay, we're doing our best to get to you. We appreciate your patience. Hang in there!" I'm nervous, as we bought two of these bulbs. Way to high a price point to have them go bad and be unable to handle product support.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs, but may require some networking knowledge
customer_reviews.text: It took me about a day to get these bulbs working well. I assumed that like most IoT IP devices that you could just include them into the WiFi and go, and you can if you have a simple home networking setup. They get more complicated if you have many devices on the network, some with priority routing (cameras, streaming video, etc). Many IP routers and switches support quality of service (QoS/WMM/Airtime-Fairness), which prioritizes real-time applications, and may delay non-real-time devices and applications. The LIFX protocol does not like this, and you end up with the "No Ack" or unresponsive issues. A little tweaking of your network, and these are the best light bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Time
customer_reviews.text: I had read previous reviews and thought that this was going to be a good purchase...I was wrong. I spent over an hour just trying to get the bulb to show in my network and connect via the app. I followed all of the directions and troubleshooting tips that were provided through the app's help and still nothing. I currently have the Phillip's smart bulbs throughout my home and while they are not as bright as this product claims to be, I guess I will never know. At least the ones I currently have were very easy to set up with no problems and most importantly, THEY WORK..
customer_reviews.author: cane78

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: pros: it's very bright. very nice colors. lifx support was prompt and helpful. cons: 1) app is not user friendly to adjust the IR feature. 2) it needs 2.4ghz (20mhz, channel 1/6 etc etc) so it doesn't connect to some routers. i've asus rt88u and it didn't connect to it (whatever i've tried) and i had to setup a dummy access point just for it to connect. read their forums/reddit and make sure if it works with your setup.
customer_reviews.author: gn0st1c

customer_reviews.title: Work great until they break....
customer_reviews.text: Lights work pretty well. Set up can be a nightmare sometimes and you end up resetting the bulb a few times but it'll get there eventually. 100% brightness isn't all that impressive but I like my lights dim so doesn't bother me. On 3 separate occasions I had 3 bulbs stop working. They start to flicker and lose connection. Tried different fixtures but it was the bulb each time less then a year in use. If they rest break might try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Check the bulbs before your 'window' to replace or return closes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these expensive bulbs for my daughter and son-in-law. They just got around to installing them a couple of days ago and one of the four bulbs does not work. The 'window' to return any of them, or to get any type of refund or a replacement, has closed, so I guess I am just out that money and I don't think you can purchase these singularly. A huge disappointment for them and much frustration for me. If you purchase these, check them out before 'your window closes' ...!
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Mom

customer_reviews.title: Smart function does not work and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: New matter how many times I contacted support, available only by contacting them to call you back, I have gotten the same answer which is to follow the instructions that are enclosed with the bulb. I reset it five times I tried multiple times with my iPhone to connect it and Alexa system to no avail. And again customer service is abysmal. I have to file an online request to speak with somebody between the hours of 9 AM to 5 PM. You have no idea when they’re calling in most of his work during those hours so customers report gets a zero. There needs to be a direct line to talk to somebody right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bowen

customer_reviews.title: So far, much better than Philips Hue
customer_reviews.text: 1) Brighter. A lot brighter. Did I mention it was brighter? Brighter is better because it dims. This light is MUCH BRIGHTER than Philips. 2) Great colors. 3) Easy App. 4) No Hub. I wish they had more advertising dollars so I had found out about them earlier. Now I have a Philips Hub + a bunch of bulbs and I wish I didn't because these are brighter and easier to use. And no hub. And cheaper. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: BabyGiant

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating To Update Firmware
customer_reviews.text: The lights are ok, but incredibly frustrating to update firmware. I have 5 of these bulbs and 40% of them have had an issue after a firmware update. After all of the frustration, I am considering switching to Philips Hue bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Francis

customer_reviews.title: Colored Alarms
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Set up your schedule for reminders. Choose a color to let you know its time to leave for work. Set a color and a dim brightness to let you know you have more or less time to snooze. Turn the lights ON before you get home and OFF after you leave. Use the themes for parties and holidays. Coolest thing I've purchased in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Combine as many A19/BR30 bulbs as you have sockets in a room and start the magic
customer_reviews.text: I went with Lifx over hue not because of the no bridge but because they have the richest color and brightest bulbs. And when you go out of your way to make scenes you can turn your living area into a truly wonderful place to be. reduce eye strain with tv, refresh you when working, make a tranquil sleep spot, anything you can think of these things can do.
customer_reviews.author: V. Langer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Engineered Lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I use them for outdoor lighting. The only thing I find annoying about them is that I have at least one light (of four) that is very 'reluctant' to check in to the phone app. The other three are rock solid and always engage if I'm of a mind to change the color scheme. With only my own experience, I'll say that the Hue Hub connectivity is far more reliable than the approach employed here - but the Hue lights just can't hold a candle (ha!) to the solidly engineered Lifx lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The setup goes ok but as soon as it gets registered it quits connecting. Seems like I have performed the reset procedure every time I want to control it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jack

customer_reviews.title: Best system out there for for the price. You pay with setup time
customer_reviews.text: They are better than anything out there and they do work. They just need a lot of love to figure out and I can’t give them a 5 for as much trouble I have gone thru to get them to function properly. Put in enough time and use a lot. It’s the best system I have tried to date and very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and infrared helps cameras see at night
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by how bright these are and the brilliance of the color, the only thing that was disappointing is that occasionally they'll get dropped off of the network and we lose control of them. The infrared is a cool feature, we have these outdoors and our cameras can see at night
customer_reviews.author: B. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great for porch light
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my front porch and it works very well. When I am feeling whimsical, I set it to a color. I like that I can use this with the Echo voice control. I can also set a timer on this so that it turns off during the day. It also doesn't effect the picture through my security cameras.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caroe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good color range, fun app, but mediocre brightness.
customer_reviews.text: Would hate to depend only on these lights for normal light output in a room, but with supplemental lights, they are super fun for color effects (etc to backdrop the room in color casts in the background of a stream/zoom call). Knocking one star for "meh" brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W

customer_reviews.title: Believe the other reviews that have trouble with connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This light is the only real solution I could find to increase the night vision for our nest doorbell. I bought 3 of these and none of them maintain connectivity to the cloud, and none of them loose connectivity at the same time, it's either one or another. Changing setting never sticks. My hue lights have been flawless, so if they could just come up with a light like this, we would be in business. I have always had poor luck with wifi lights, only zigbee and z-wave seem to work reliably.
customer_reviews.author: TracyP

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed! I have 24 lifx bulbs this was my 1st lifx + bulb. When i activate the IR light its FU(ks my camers up washing everything out. Im not sure if im just unluckily and purchased a broken bulb or if this is a common issue. I really like lifx bulbs but definitely can not recomend the lifx +
customer_reviews.author: Braden gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing IR
customer_reviews.text: Pros- great colors, bright as a 75w bulb, setup two in 10 min. Cons- lackluster IR (added maybe 2 or 3 extra inches of visibility for my arlo cameras), confusing app controls to set colors and intensity for average users. Overall I paid extra for IR capabilities and these did not deliver anywhere close to as hoped. May buy again but non IR model.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs loose communication with the WiFi
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are fantastic. I am however struggling a bit to keep them all working as intended. I've got 29 bulbs out right now all over the house, inside and outside under a porch, and every now and then one or two will loose communication with the network. When that happens I loose control in the Lifx app and with Echo dot. I am going to try and fix the problem by adding addition access points for my home WiFi but that just increase my cost. I hope it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: meb

customer_reviews.title: They are the best for can lighting
customer_reviews.text: We had some of the mini color bulbs in our can lights, had to use them with an extension adapter piece. Replaced them with these BR30s and not only do they fit perfectly the light they cast is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 lights and I choose these because they don't need a hub, and they work with nest and IFTTT. Love the fade on and off options, schedules, and having a patio light that can change with the seasons. Also having the security of a bulb that lights up your room on your nest cam when the lights are off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not just defective product, but poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Didn't connect. May as well be a light from the 90's. Now I have to go through the hassle of returning this because they can't make it work. Ignored by customer service. All they knew was apple.

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the fact that you couldn't use the app without ...
customer_reviews.text: My first bulb started flickering with about 50 hours or so of use. Replacement provided which has not been tested yet. Also, I did not like the fact that you couldn't use the app without registered on LIFX.com There is no technical reason why you need to have an account to provision your wifi information on the bulb for local use.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/Quality product easy to install

These lights are easy to install and very convenient! Would highly recommend you try them! We have gotten so many compliments on these cool lights!

customer_reviews.title: IR is a great addition to these excellent bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a little over a year.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure but I don't think the infrared light last as long as the regular ones do. Only lasted me a little over a year. I'm not sure how long the warranty is or how to get a replacement.

customer_reviews.title: LIFX are better than Phillips
customer_reviews.text: The best smart bulb over WiFi without a hub and easy to set up from the package. The bulb are 10x brighter than Phillips lights and they are easy to setup, less 10 mins. Will purchase more

There are Lifx vs Hue videos on YouTube that prove lifx has brighter and better hues of color.

Customer service didn’t care and offered 30% off for me to buy a new one. Rude. I have just had another one stop for no reason. Again no resolution just a 30% off message to buy a new one. Don’t buy these they break down very quickly for the price

However I do love being able to call up different scenes verbally, using Alexa.

I have had problems with it getting disconnected from the network from time to time and having to manually turn it on. It doesn't happen very often though and is the only reason I took 1 star off the rating. Never would have thought I would one day complain about having to turn on a light bulb.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: I have a connected apartment

If you already bought them before Home kit was enabled the Apple have you update the bulbs and go through the process of making them home kit compatible which gives them Apple IDs. Siri works great Alexa works great.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy

customer_reviews.text: These lights are fun, but they loose their programming often and sometimes can’t be attached to WiFi, which is required for use. I have around 10 of them and they all have the same problem.

customer_reviews.title: I have 14 of these now and I lover everything ...

customer_reviews.title: I'd HIGHLY recommend the strips over these if it fits your use

customer_reviews.title: Amazing LIFX + with infrared
customer_reviews.text: I have many LIFX and this new model LIFX + allows you to use it at night with IR light. You dont have to leave the light on, just leave the IR on and the security camera will have perfect shots every time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The light works great with Alexa. Using it for my front porch light

customer_reviews.title: Works well but a bit complicated
customer_reviews.text: Like it. A bit difficult to set up at first. Once set up works well. Bulb burns a little hot. Haven't tried using Alexa with it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifx also has amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one stopped working within 2 months. The other one is not working all the time. If you are going to buy these lights, get them directly from Lifx website because you can return it over 30 days. If you buy on Amazon, after 30 days you cannot return the light if it stops working. Lifx also has amazing customer service. In short; I regret buying the lights from Amazon but I don't regret getting the lights because they are very nice. My problem is that I always buy everything on Amazon so lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: PhotovideogoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of color and easy to use app
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the infrared part of it, but these were on sale for same price as non-infrared option when those were out of stock. Great variety of color and easy to use app. I have difficulty with getting the Alexa skill to set scenes, but that's an issue with the app, not the light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reproduction of colors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reproduction of colors, set up was reasonably easy (a bit of switching back and for between bulb wifi and house wifi). Works perfectly with Alexa. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Colors are great and android phone controls it pretty well but we ...

customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Easy to setup and connect to my Alexa without need of a bridge!

customer_reviews.title: This bulb works fine, I prefer Philips Hue when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: This bulb works fine, I prefer Philips Hue when it comes to smart bulbs as their hub makes it very nice if connecting multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Died but LIFX made it right.
customer_reviews.text: The bulb suddenly and completely died after a couple days. BUT LIFX quickly replaced the bulb and the second one has been working very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Needham

customer_reviews.title: The colors are neat until the bulb stops working.
customer_reviews.text: Of two bulbs, one stopped changing colors after about a month. The other doesn’t turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.B

customer_reviews.title: i have been using this smart bulb almost over a month and it was working ...
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this smart bulb almost over a month and it was working perfectly.i also linked it to amazon's alexa and they have been working great together. but like a couple of days ago,all of a sudden it stopped working.i'm trying to figure out the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely in love with this product. Pair it with your Echo and you have a digital (and less annoying) Clapper.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio Gama

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Echo
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these and plan to get more. Works great with Echo.
customer_reviews.author: SFGraham

customer_reviews.title: Works great but I am trying to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I am trying to figure out how to get the Light-up security function to work when detecting Nest cam motion. In the LIFX app there is only 1 of 3 Nest cameras that shows. Fortunately LIFX tech support is very responsive and are working on this as I type.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Best color light bulb on the market today
customer_reviews.text: These install easily as long as you connect to the bulb BEFORE you connect to the wifi network yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb. Very bright and works well with the app. Only complaint is sometimes it disconnects from the app. 5/20/20 Edit: Major complaint is that they disconnect. I have had to reset all three of my Lifx lights 3+ times just this month. Extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Automatic evening and morning schedules is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: These work terrifically. Scheduling is a breeze. Automatic evening and morning schedules is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: John Bradley Szostak

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy (had to reboot my router to complete it) and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of the earlier generation bulbs and when this came out with the new infrared lighting I wanted to give it a try in an area we setup a security camera when we leave on trips. Setup was easy (had to reboot my router to complete it) and so far in my dry run it has worked great. Really enhances the nighttime visibility in the area. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SteveV

customer_reviews.title: They work great with enhancing the night vision on the nest cam
customer_reviews.text: They work great with enhancing the night vision on the nest cam. Great integration with the amazon echo. Colors are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles McGary

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I ordered these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered these bulbs. They are so much easier to set up than most bulbs because a "hub" is not required and they simply need to be added to wifi. I very much suggest to find a guide as there are a couple tricks that can make the process very quick and easy. Im pretty tech-savvy and ran into a couple hiccups that were easily worked thru. LIFX also has their developer API available so if you are even barely familiar with programming, you can take advantage of that (This, combined with Amazon Alexa's open API and a little fooling around with AWS or even just IFTT makes for some fantastic results)
customer_reviews.author: DaltonDouglas

customer_reviews.title: 2 months down the road they start to overheat and shut off on their own.  Junk.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these bulbs and I've had to replace every single one. They are in open air floor can fixtures. The colors are very bright and very lush. However, after a month or two the lights start to overheat and shut off on their own. Then they don't follow the color you choose in the app and overheat and shut off again. I have to unplug them, wait an hour, plug them back in and they work great until the next episode. For the money you pay for these things, they are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble and zero communication from seller.
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity issues. Not bad, but not snappy. Lights rarely were in sync so you have two different colors. I don't want to have to open an app every time I want to make a change. Also, I returned the lights and they say they never received them. Now I've been recharged! But there's no contact us information and no replying to their email. I would like to speak with someone who can help straighten this out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spruiell

product_meta.title: LIFX + 1100-Lumen BR30 Smart LED Light Bulb with Infrared (LHB30E26UC10P) Multi Colored - 17W - New
product_meta.description: Style:BR30 - SingleLIFX + (Br30) Wi-Fi smart LED light bulb with infrared for night vision, adjustable, multicolor, dimmable, no hub required, works with Alexa. With LIFX, how your bulb connects is important, so all of our WiFi technology is built right into each individual bulb - no hub required. Works with Nest.
feature_bullets: Works with Amazon Alexa to support dimming, shades of white, and color settings through voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
16 million colors, warm to cool whites and infrared for night vision
Easy to set up, built in wifi - no hub required
Works with Alexa, Apple HomeKit and Google Assistant

specifications.Special Features: Works with Alexa, Apple HomeKit and the Google Assistant
